% $Id: 14-makeindex.tex 22 2007-09-23 20:35:35Z andrew $
% Test input file for checking index generation.
% Do not make gratuitous changes here as the text is checked by the
% test script 14-makeindex.t.

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\makeindex
\date{20 September 2007}
\author{A.N. Other}
\title{Simple Test Document 14}
\begin{document}
\maketitle

This is a test document that def{}ines the index terms `seal' and `sea
lion'.  These are the example terms used in the makeindex man page.
\index{seal}
\index{sea lion}

\printindex
\end{document}
